original_text: Then she said, “They used to say in former times, ‘Let them but ask counsel at Abel,’ and so they settled a matter.
korean_text: 여인이 말하여 이르되 옛 사람들이 흔히 말하기를 아벨에게 가서 물을 것이라 하고 그 일을 끝내었나이다

sentences.original_text: “They used to say in former times,
‘Let them but ask counsel at Abel,’
and so they settled a matter.
